## ResourceTools.IExtendedProcessedResources interface

Extended processed resources with additional metadata and context. Includes information about source configuration and bundle loading.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface IExtendedProcessedResources extends IProcessedResources 
```
**Extends:** [IProcessedResources](./ts-res-ui-components.resourcetools.iprocessedresources.md)
